## Source: ossf-package-analysis (521032aa86f84d6ee0bb3ad2b7b97e43683ed2040212f5b7cb5359f10549fea6)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'sandstorm-widgets-nyse-website' @ 7.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
